com.fluidops.iwb.widget
Class SemWiki

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
          com.fluidops.iwb.widget.SemWiki
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.fluidops.ajax.FEventListener
public class SemWiki
extends com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer

component which allows entering a mini wiki page with hyperlinks to other subjects and semantic links which add facts to the fact base

Author:
aeb, uli, msc

saveWiki

public void saveWiki(java.lang.String comment,
                     java.lang.String content)
Save the given wiki content using the underlying wikistorage. If the wiki page contains semantic links, these are stored as well. In case an error occurs while saving semantic links (e.g. due to read only repositories) the wiki page is not saved and an appropriate error message is thrown wrapped in a exception.

Parameters:
comment -
content -

reloadWikiPage

public void reloadWikiPage()

saveSemanticLinkDiff

public static void saveSemanticLinkDiff(java.lang.String wikiPageOld,
                                        java.lang.String wikiPageNew,
                                        org.openrdf.model.URI subject,
                                        Context context)
Extracts semantic links from the old and from the new wiki page and collects the diff inside the addStmts and remStmts variables.

Parameters:
wikiPageOld - the old wiki page text (may be null or empty)
wikiPageNew - (may be null or empty)
subject - the URI represented by the wiki page
context - the context in which to store the diff
